nodes.text: The Droid Assassin's rifle was a heavily modified disruptor rifle that was primarily used by the HK-series assassin droid during the Old Sith Wars. Some of the modifications of this weapon included improved optics, reduced recoil, extended range, and several open ports for even more modular upgrades.
In the game, Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords, only HK-47 can equip this weapon.
